thread.title: Zynga Inc Will Now Sell “Mini-Game” Ads Within Games
thread.title_full: Zynga Inc Will Now Sell “Mini-Game” Ads Within Games

title: Zynga Inc Will Now Sell “Mini-Game” Ads Within Games
text: October 10, 2015 at 21:08 PM EDT Zynga Inc Will Now Sell “Mini-Game” Ads Within Games Zynga Inc has developed an in-house solution to deliver advertisements in the form of mini games. Created by Zynga’s internal Studio E, the interactive ‘SponsoredPlay’ ads will be available soon to players. Will this increase ad sales?
